EmailTemplate.description: Email notification to Community Admin to let them know a new user request is pending approval (private Community).
EmailTemplate.name: Community Admin Approval Required (Private) - V1.0
EmailTemplate.subject: New Community User Request Pending Approval
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!GPO_Lead__c.SU_CommuContact__c},
You have users requesting access to your Office Depot® Community. Please use the link below to login to your Community and authorize or decline access to your Community.
Your Office Depot® Team​
https://community.officedepot.com/GPOHome?id={!GPO_Lead__c.AOPS_Cust_ID__c}
